14:33:33</sys_updated_on><value>(function execute(inputs, outputs) {
var cmd = './hcli token mint'
if (inputs.token.token_id) { cmd = cmd + ' --tokenid ' + inputs.token.token_id } if (inputs.amount) { cmd = cmd + ' --amount ' + inputs.amount }
for (i=0; i < inputs.metadata.length; i++) { cmd = cmd + " --metadata '" + inputs.metadata[i] + "'" }
if (inputs.sign_with) { while (inputs.sign_with.next()) { cmd = cmd + ' --sign ' + inputs.sign_with.public_key } }
outputs.cmd = cmd
})(inputs, outputs); </value><variable display_value="Script">71aa7f6647032200b4fad7527c9a719b</variable></sys_variable_value><sys_element_mapping action="delete_multiple" var response = JSON.parse(inputs.response)
var fail = false
if (!response) { outputs.hstatus = "NO_RESPONSE" fail = true }
if (response.resp) { outputs.transaction_id = response.resp.transactionId outputs.transaction_hash = response.resp.transactionHash outputs.node_id = response.resp.nodeId } else { fail = true }
if (response.receipt ) { // outputs.hstatus = response.receipt.status // outputs.account_id = response.receipt.accountId // outputs.token_id = response.receipt.tokenId outputs.serials = response.receipt.serials // outputs.topic_id = response.receipt.topicId } else { fail = true }
if (response.record) { outputs.transaction_fee = response.record.transactionFee outputs.consensus_timestamp = response.record.consensusTimestamp } else { fail = true }
if (response.error) { outputs.hstatus = response.error.status fail = true }
outputs.fail = fail
})(inputs, outputs);

var response = JSON.parse(inputs.response)
var fail = false
if (!response) { outputs.hstatus = "NO_RESPONSE" fail = true }
if (response.resp) { outputs.transaction_id = response.resp.transactionId outputs.transaction_hash = response.resp.transactionHash outputs.node_id = response.resp.nodeId } else { fail = true }
if (response.receipt ) { // outputs.hstatus = response.receipt.status // outputs.account_id = response.receipt.accountId // outputs.token_id = response.receipt.tokenId outputs.serials = response.receipt.serials // outputs.topic_id = response.receipt.topicId } else { fail = true }
if (response.record) { outputs.transaction_fee = response.record.transactionFee outputs.consensus_timestamp = response.record.consensusTimestamp } else { fail = true }
if (response.error) { outputs.hstatus = response.error.status fail = true }
outputs.fail = fail
})(inputs, outputs);

var cmd = './hcli token mint'

outputs.cmd = cmd
